artist: Maker: Duro Mold and Manufacturing Inc.
description: silver oval base with 'rocket ship' and 'globe'; spring mechanism on ship fires coin into globe; red pigment on firing mechanism, side of ship and nob in front top fin; stopper in bottom slides; see also L2003.147.752
inscription:
Inscription; Decal

decal in black: [\"Watch Your Savings Soar\"/ FIRST NATIONAL BANK/ OF ARIZONA/ Member F.D.I.C.]

on space ship: [XU232]; on base: [STRATO BANK]; inside rim of base: [U.S. PAT D 171-243 CANADIAN PAT. DURO MOLD AND MFG. INC. DETROIT MICH. U.S.A.]
title: "Strato Bank" mechanical bank
